title: configure and test autoexport of SOLR CWIKI after existing ref guide content is loaded
description:
setup autoexport template to include ASL on every page
	
		http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/admin/autoexport/configuration.action
		https://cwiki.apache.org/INFRA/cwiki.html#Cwiki-Ifweusethewikitomaintainprojectdocumentation,arethereanyspecialconsiderations?
	
	
	put the customized template someplace safe in SVN
	
		add a big ugly comment to the template pointing to it's authoritative location so people don't try to edit it in the config UI w/o updating SVN as well
	
	
	test that autoexport works with page edits and doesn't blow up now that the space is really large

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content: autoexport is no longer supported/required in the ASF cwiki, so we don't need to worry about this.
